additionalProperty.name: Warning
additionalProperty.value: Keep out of reach of children. Avoid contact with skin. Do not use as a baby wipe or for personal hygiene. Hard surface disinfectant only. Not to be used on skin. If in eyes wash out immediately with a large amount of water. If irritation persists, contact a doctor. For advice, contact a Poisons Information Centre (Phone Australia 13 11 26, New Zealand 0800 764 766) or a doctor.

description: Dettol Tru Clean Antibacterial Surface Cleanser & Disinfectant Surface Spray Crisp Pear
name: Tru Clean Antibacterial Surface Cleanser & Disinfectant Surface Spray Crisp Pear
